name: evalup_api
description: Restful service for an evaluation management application with nodejs

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/**/*.test.js --require tests/bootstrap.js --required chai/register-expect
scripts.test:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/**/*.test.js --watch --require tests/bootstrap.js --required chai/register-expect

author: thetechshrine
